coreAtributes.name: jewelled-heart butt plug
coreAtributes.description: A metal plug, designed to be inserted into someone's anus. The cap has a pretty, heart-shaped gemstone fixed into it.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull the butt plug out from your [pc.ass+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You firmly grab [npc.name]'s butt plug and yank it out of [npc.her] [npc.ass+].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls the butt plug out from your [pc.ass+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] firmly grabs your butt plug and yanks it out of your [pc.ass+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] firmly grabs [npc2.name]'s butt plug and yanks it out of [npc2.herHis] [npc2.ass+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You push the butt plug into your [pc.ass+].
replacementText.playerNPC: You push the butt plug into [npc.name]'s [npc.ass+].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the butt plug into [npc.her] [npc.ass+].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] push the butt plug into your [pc.ass+].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.sheHe] roughly forces the butt plug into your [pc.ass+]
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.sheHe] roughly forces the butt plug into [npc2.herHis] [npc2.ass+].
